channel.title: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress_Version6 on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress_Version6 on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress_Version6
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress_Version6 Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Subnet_IpAddress data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer IPv6 address. Local id An IP's internal identifier. Type: integer ipAddress An IP address expressed in dotted quad format. Type: string isBroadcast Indicates if an IP address is reserved to be used as the network broadcast address and cannot be assigned to a network interface Type: boolean
